Content: Values like population or production should have random fluctuations
applied to their first derivative. This should simulate the influence
of individual and wane with higher numbers. Imitating a gaussian
distribution the random factor scales with sqrt(x) instead of linear.
So if we have a value y, a change x and a uniform distribution u the
final formula is y += x + u(-0.1, 0.1) * sqrt(x)
